definition: variant of 籌劃|筹划[chou2 hua4]
chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Set up an upper-grade teaching material planning committee. Work slated to begin and wrap up in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 成立高年级教材筹画小组，于暑假中研发教材。

definition: to calculate (using bamboo tokens on a counting board)/to count beads/fig. to budget/to plan (an investment)
variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
to ponder a solution/to consider (the best move, how to find a way etc)
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
confidential aspects of a matter/secrets/key moment for action
to restore (deposed monarch, rule, system of laws, ecological system etc)/restoration
